channel.title: Unban from runescape?
channel.description: Well I have been banned from runescape. And am wondering if I use a proxy when I go to runescape and I log in . Will this unban me and let me play whenever I use the proxy? Or is runescape specially designed to that doesn't happen? Or does jagex think that runescapers are so udmb they don't even know what a proxy is?

item.title: Unban from runescape?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:5, topic:135745”][quote author=TR3V0R link=topic=187218.msg1691169#msg1691169 date=1187763061]
Has to be the dumbest thing i’ve ever heard. Everyone thinks jagex is stupid. Actually they are very smart.
[/quote]

they are smart in some ways and stupid in other ways… like releasing updates before they should be released which they normally do…[/quote]
Yeah but all companies do that.

I don’t know how many times EverQuest2 released these new awesome expansion packs with a million new features and half of them are missing because of a “bug.”

Jagex doesn’t ban IP’s, or at least not without an account ban. If they only banned IP adresses then everyone on dialup or with a dynamic IP could simply use their account by re-connecting to the internet.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban from runescape?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:2, topic:135745”]No.
They don’t ban Ip’s, they ban the account.

/deadson[/quote]
They ban some annoying autoers sometimes.
They said it on the homepage and happend to some people already.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban from runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Heaven Heaven
item.description:
@Heaven wrote:

they are smart in some ways and stupid in other ways… like releasing updates before they should be released which they normally do…
[/quote]
That’s so true. If you get locked for typing in invalid passwords, if you have dynamic ip and you switch your modem you can start again. You think they’d make it more advanced then that. And if you type the exact same phrase 3 times in a row you have to wait a minute to do it again to prevent auto typers.

Read full topic
